attributes.action: Return the Lewis Chessmen to their nation of discovery for display in Edinburgh & Stornoway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2007-2008 a dispute arose regarding the most appropriate place to display the pieces of the original Lewis Chess Set. The issue first arosein 2007 with calls from SNP in the Western Isles for the return of the pieces to the place they were found. Only 11 Lewis Chessmen rest at the National Museum of Scotland while the other 82 remain in the British Museum in London

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
